thread.title: Fire destroys North Las Vegas home, displaces 8 people
thread.title_full: Fire destroys North Las Vegas home, displaces 8 people

title: Fire destroys North Las Vegas home, displaces 8 people
text:
Published By: Las Vegas RJ - Today 
Eight people were displaced by a fire that destroyed a North Las Vegas house Saturday, officials say....
